website_summaries.verdict: The Danner Light II is a tough-as-nails, mid-cut day hiking boot that takes comfort and stability to a whole new level. It’s a beautifully crafted footwear with a surprisingly lightweight build, satisfactory traction on challenging terrain, and a price tag that—although quite expensive—is considered a worthy investment by many. Water intrusion and heat buildup also do not pose a problem as the Light II has a breathable waterproof membrane by Gore-Tex. On the flip side, buyers criticized the boot for having a too-narrow default fit and requiring a long break-in period.
pros: A score of satisfied owners applauded the Light II for its excellent heel and ankle support
A large number of hikers couldn’t help but commend the amazing traction this boot provides
The second generation Danner Light impressed a huge chunk of its user base for its durability
According to one of them—a US Army soldier—it’s one of the sturdiest boots he has ever owned
Many wearers found a high level of comfort in this hiking footwear
This above-the-ankle hiker gained positive remarks from a multitude of owners for its waterproof performance
One expert reviewer even conquered streams, snowy regions, and wet grasslands with not a trace of moist on his feet
Many Danner enthusiasts considered the Light II a worthwhile investment
Quite a number of customers were all praises for this leather hiker’s satisfying breathability
This boot is surprisingly lightweight, according to a good number of users
One of them even likened it to a pair of slippers
cons: Many users weren’t too thrilled about the long break-in time the Danner Light II demands
A considerable number of owners came away irked by the narrowness of the boot
A couple of hikers got further disappointed when the supposed wider version was still too narrow for them

customer_reviews.title: Lining wrinkes up and rubs on the top of my foot
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love these. I did a LOT of research before purchasing these and they are expensive. The problem is the lining. It wrinkles near the top of the tongues. After wearing them for a bit, this becomes uncomfortable (kind of feels like there is something inside the top of the shoe rubbing against the top of my foot). I guess it feels that way because there IS something there: extra material...rubbing away... Trouble is, I did not try them until after the 30 days were up. I know, I am stupid, but I was out of town. Anyway, I will try calling Danner and see what they say.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis Gregg

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in these boots
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed in these boots. I bought them almost a year ago and was perturbed that they were so tight without an insole. But I could still wear them and decided to break them in and see how they turn out. After several months I decided to try a worn/broke-in pair of insoles from my other pair of Danners and they felt great. I loved my boots! Then, the left heel developed a click. A very distracting click. I removed the insoles and it’s still there. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works quickly and easily
customer_reviews.text: I was not sure this would work. Well what a nice surprise- it does. It measures moisture quickly and easily. This will help my plants by avoiding overwatering. I am thrilled with my purchase. Highly recommend this moisture sensor !!
customer_reviews.author: Grandma Ellie

customer_reviews.title: Warm boots, but great boots
customer_reviews.text: Hot Feet??? My feet get hot easily. Beware, these boots will keep your feet warm. I've had them for 3 years now, and these are GREAT boots. They seem to be waterproof, and very tough. They look even better with age. They are impervious to abuse, and very comfortable for both hiking and daily wear. I definitely cannot wear these in hot weather - but, I have to admit that I'm averse to heat overall, so this may not apply to everyone. Otherwise, I highly recommend these boots. I also have the 400g Elk Hunter made by Danner for Cabela's. That's a great snow boot for extreme cold. Otherwise, I'm happy with my light ii's for snow.
customer_reviews.author: bart-q

customer_reviews.title: Item broke after little use
customer_reviews.text: The prongs are soft aluminum and they can near the meter unit when inserting into soil. After one bends a few times and you have to straighten it, it will break. Never did get a pH reading, but I bought it for the moisture reading.
customer_reviews.author: Keith G.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome boots
customer_reviews.text: Love danners. Had a pair when I was in the marine corps and they lasted through the ruggedness of pt in them and everyday wear for 8 years until they got stolen. Finally buying these and I’m excited to break them in. Best looking and feeling boot I’ve owned!
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Rivas

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Work
customer_reviews.text: Pay attention to negative reviews. This does not work at all. The meter does not move or change whether on moisture, light or PH. Returning and will try again to see if this was a defective item as I was sent a used product.
customer_reviews.author: WP

customer_reviews.title: Quite Surprised
customer_reviews.text: I was quite surprised how well this meter worked. The water moist reading I just look for is dry (needle at far right) , moist(Middle) and wet (Far Left), that keeps it simple.
customer_reviews.author: CRC

customer_reviews.title: Love the Boots.
customer_reviews.text: After buying Rocky Boots for a few years and never completely happy--I started looking for a new boot. I thought Rocky Boots were made in America. When I found out they were made in China I was disappointed. After going to 3 Major shoe stores I ask the question--Do you sell Boots that are made in America??? Not one store could say Yes. I went on line and ask the question and Danner Boots came up. After some research I ordered a pair of light weight---Water proof---wide size boots---MADE IN AMERICA. I have had the boots for 3 weeks and have been very pleased so far. The price was about the same as boots made in other countries.
customer_reviews.author: scott r.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My second pair of Danner boots. My first pair was a set of Danner Patrol boots. Those boots are still going strong. I am sending them in for remanufacturing. As for these new boots, I look forward to many years of service as well. They fit great and look perfect. I don't really understand the whole "breaking in" period. I put them on and they felt great. I called Danner today and asked them if they recommend doing anything to the boots. The representative said that Danner recommends using petroleum jelly to help break the boot in. Again, after 15 years of service with my previous Danner boot, I swear by this brand.
customer_reviews.author: RD

customer_reviews.title: Best boots I've owned.
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to pay this much for a pair of boots. I use them for work and backpacking. They fit both applications very well. My feet stay cozy, dry, cozy. Yup, double cozy. I would recommend these to family, and I'll be buying these boots again. I did have to send them back after 3 months. The fiberglass shank had broke and was jabbing me in the heel. It happens, customer service was splendid! Danner had me send both boots back for repair, and I got brand new boots about two weeks later. Not bad considering they were travelling across the country for more than half of the time.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Very good boot, work at winery so go through the boots, these are expensive, so hopefully they last longer
customer_reviews.author: Bob Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to measure my soil pH. I set the switch to pH and stuck it into multiple spots in my grass and garden areas and the dial never budged. So I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: DennyOR

customer_reviews.title: Never worked
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to monitor the moisture level, but it doesn't register anything. I even placed it in a cup of water and the meter never changed.
customer_reviews.author: C. Stout

customer_reviews.title: Really well-made boots
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd pair of the made-in-USA Light II boot. The first pair lasted 5 years, the second is still going after 3+ years. I bought my third pair now as insurance against the possibility that the boot could be discontinued. They are the real thing, not the Chinese-made molded sole junk that costs like the real thing but quickly falls apart...speaking from unhappy experience. I wear them as a work boot in a palm nursery field that is often wet, though my feet never are. They give excellent protection from the frequently encountered spines of pruned fronds. I've never had a broken eyelet or hook. Even the laces last years.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: With his unusual feet size and shape it is almost impossible to find comfortable shoes. He does want to get a liner ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband and if he's not wearing his work boots then he's wearing these. With his unusual feet size and shape it is almost impossible to find comfortable shoes. He does want to get a liner fit great for them but like I stated he has weird feet. Otherwise he has said that they are great. I can already see the quality of the craftsmanship over his last pair the moment we opened the box. Would highly recommend this company and especially this pair of boots. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Johana Eckerman

customer_reviews.title: The wife loves it.
customer_reviews.text: My wife swears her plants are healthier using this meter.
customer_reviews.author: Marvin Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Great boots! Danner for the win!
customer_reviews.text: These things fit like a glove right out of the box. In comparison to my Mountain Light 2s I can already tell they're going to break in much easier. ALSO, I typically wear a 12D but people recommended I go with a EE and I don't regret it. The EE fits just like a D
customer_reviews.author: JakeDEG

customer_reviews.title: Good fit. My husband likely these
customer_reviews.text: Good fit. My husband likely these. They did require an insole as the ribbed sole of the shoe was uncomfortable. He is pretty hard on his shoes so we will see how they hold up. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Maya McCarroll

customer_reviews.title: Sweet sweet sweet
customer_reviews.text: Great hiker. Probably best I've ever worn. Wide size is slightly more narrow than what I'm used to. Insole is flat but an orthotic is included. I use Treadlab insoles in them and the boot is now sweet perfection.
customer_reviews.author: John R. Lohr

customer_reviews.title: Be careful when using in hard soil
customer_reviews.text: Product appears to be accurate, but when inserting in less than soft soil the prongs bend, and will eventually snap off. Needs stronger reinforcement at the top of the prongs.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Stiles

customer_reviews.title: All good early
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Still breaking in so kind of stiff but breaking in nicely. These are quality constructed boots. Much better construction than the Vietnam Danner hikers I've worn for the last two years. The EE width is perfect in this style if normally wearing a standard width boot.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Myers

customer_reviews.title: Solid made boot!
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so this is the second pair, as the first ones were both too small and defective, as in the opening on the right boot was nearly too small to get my foot into. Sent them back and received these within a week in a size 13 which are now a perfect fit. Couldn't be happier! Have taken a short hike to try them out and can already tell there will be very little break in period. They feel great and you can see immediately that they are very well constructed. Can't wait to trek the mountains of Peru in them!
customer_reviews.author: DXer

customer_reviews.title: Great boot
customer_reviews.text: My husband’s favorite boots!!! He’s on his feet all day and these boots fit him well and feel great!
customer_reviews.author: Rwilder

customer_reviews.title: I love these boots
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots! Keep the feet nice and warm while walking thru slush and mud in the Pacific NW winter... great for hiking trails too! I wear a size 12 shoe, but ordered size 13 boots & glad I did... with big wooly socks it just works better.
customer_reviews.author: Eliot Tuxedo

customer_reviews.title: You my need to order a wider width than you normally would
customer_reviews.text: I should have heeded the coutions I read about these running narrow. I had to send them back and could not locate a wider width. Iikely a good boot if you get the right width.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Great boots, nice & sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: I have had various Danner boots over the past 20 years and have loved them all. These boots live up to the standard of quality I've come to expect from Danner and am glad that I got them. They're well built, sturdy, look good and keep my feet dry. They don't have Thinsulate (which I knew when I was buying them) and they keep my feet plenty warm while shoveling snow for 30-60 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew J. Haslett

customer_reviews.title: Great looking, really love it
customer_reviews.text: Great looking, really love it. There is No insole inside. I usually wear size US8(41.5-42) with insole inside, fortunately, I try on at shop before raise an order. For reference: US8.5(42), little bit tight without insole US9(43), fit without insole US9.5(43.5), fit with insole inside
customer_reviews.author: Jack Yeung

customer_reviews.title: Great Boot
customer_reviews.text: Love the boot. Fit was a bit narrow at first. After I applied some Obenauf's Heavy Duty LP to them they now fit like a glove. They seem like they will last a good while. Not sure about the soles though, they can be very slippery on wet tile. I hope over time the sole will soften a bit and not be so slippery on the tile.
customer_reviews.author: Chad D

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: Item did not work. The dial never moved no matter how long I waited on any of my plants
customer_reviews.author: OrangeGoose

customer_reviews.title: good quality construction
customer_reviews.text: It's nice to find a boot still made in the USA. I ordered size 11EE, my normal size, and they fit perfectly. They are very comfortable and don't seem to require much break in. The construction looks outstanding, and the leather is very thick. I'm planning to use these boots for day hikes on mostly flat terrain.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Boot fits as expected.  Very comfortable on first wear.
customer_reviews.text: Boot is made of superior material. Fits like a glove (great fit). Lightweight. Great hiking or camping boot.
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: Top quality American made boot. I own several Danner's ...
customer_reviews.text: Top quality American made boot. I own several Danner's for different applications. All Danner's run small, I use a size 10 medium normally but ordered a 10.5 EE and it fits perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Boots for the Money
customer_reviews.text: Gosh these are great boots at a great price. Most local stores sell these for $300. It is a little hot to get my feet used to them before hunting season but I plan on going for a few long morning walks in the next month. I bought a EE because my toes seemed a little cramped and they now they fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: C. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great boots, but don't ship with insoles.
customer_reviews.text: Great boots, but do NOT try them on without having first put in a good pair of insoles. The plastic heel cup that comes with it isn't sufficient, and is hard on the feet. You'll want additional padding under your toes. These boots shouldn't ship without real insoles in my opinion, but that's how them are.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ground pounder!
customer_reviews.text: I liked the all leather better, but this is a clutch shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Boba Chux

customer_reviews.title: Nope!
customer_reviews.text: Nope! Waste of money. Same reading no matter where it’s placed - no matter what soil in which it’s placed.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Lumos

customer_reviews.title: 3rd pair
customer_reviews.text: Third pair of the Light's - in the past ten years I can't find a better boot. Wore them everyday to work and abused them very badly. Got this pair to strictly hike in. Fit perfect right out of the box, in a few weeks I am sure they will feel like slippers. Have never had any issues and look forward to where they will take me.
customer_reviews.author: BKWohls

customer_reviews.title: Boots run narrow in size.
customer_reviews.text: Stitching and tread is excellent quality. Had to return one pair because they were NOT size EE. These boots run narrow. Disappointing for the price. Should fit correctly. They need better quality control. Vendor was fast and shipping excellent.
customer_reviews.author: TheBear

customer_reviews.title: Finest Leather,Superior Features-A Bootmakers Masterpiece!...
customer_reviews.text: ...Think of What You Require In A General Use/Hiking/Coool Boot...Here It Is! Gore Tex, Finest Leather, Vibram Soles, Rebuildable...WhattaYaGot?!...The Best Of The Best! Danner, USA Built...Dats What Ya Got! Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: GODZILLA

customer_reviews.title: Surprised by such a good fit
customer_reviews.text: Great boots, comfortable from the start. Look good enough to wear at the office. Surprising well formed to the foot. Most boots fit because you tighten the laces down on the foot. These are exactly tailored to fit the foot, like a fine dress shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Great boots!
customer_reviews.text: The boots arrived quickly. Based on other reviews, we ordered a half size up and they were perfect. Expect to wear them once and not take them off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I wear this boot 5 days a week
customer_reviews.text: I'm on my third pair in what seems to be 15 years. Extremely comfortable and indestructible. I wear them in the snow, mud, on the roof, and in the office. My feet are always cool and dry. I don't treat them as well as I should, and they last for years. Well worth the investment. Made in America!
customer_reviews.author: William Edsall

customer_reviews.title: sharp looking hiking boot
customer_reviews.text: I find the leather to be premium grade and the soles are rock solid. I wear a firm arch support which fits easily. I was thinking at point of sale that I would cross purpose the boot for carpentry work but I think they are best suited for hiking and outdoor activity. I typically chose 4e width and wasn't worried about a 2e boot. They are snug just before the toe box and after the first week they seem to be breaking in. The leather is thick and rigid quick is excellent but it will take some time. I need to pick up some leather treatment to help the break in and protection. Very pleased with the boots
customer_reviews.author: Andrew S Bullitt

customer_reviews.title: excellent Danner quality
customer_reviews.text: Typical, excellent Danner quality. These boots are going to take quite a bit of breaking in. My pair is finally starting to become comfortable after wearing them every chance I can. Awesome quality and craftsmanship.
customer_reviews.author: Steven J.

customer_reviews.title: Great Hiking Boots
customer_reviews.text: Great hiking boots. I've tried some more "modern styles" but these are the best. Solid, comfortable, and durable. soles grip well and are the prefect stiffness.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Typical perfection from danner
customer_reviews.text: Crazy comfortable, and fit perfectly. I love these boots wear them every day.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: Best boot I've ever owned, wish I had ten pair! They fit perfect could wear all day and never have any discomfort.
customer_reviews.author: AshDD

customer_reviews.title: Worthless
customer_reviews.text: No instructions on how to read it and it’s not self explanatory. It doesn’t work for me and I want to return it for a refund. Can I still do that?
customer_reviews.author: Babs

customer_reviews.title: A bit too narrow
customer_reviews.text: Loved the boots, but even the EE’s were a bit too narrow. They may have stretched eventually, but the was too expensive a gamble for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Novice Hiker
customer_reviews.text: I believe this is a awesome boot and I've only wore them a few times and so far no issues what so ever as for as fit and comfort. No care instructions in package for the boot so I called The Danner Company "Great American Company" about the care for the boot and they were very helpful recommending Danner Clear Boot Dressing. I will update review once broken in.
customer_reviews.author: digitalcameraman

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of Boots!!
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a 9.5, D so after reading numerous reviews I ordered size 10, EE. I could not wear them with the plastic heel cups because of a prior injury. Instead I put pair of Spenco Crosstrainer insoles in the boots and they fit and feel great. The Spenco insoles also provided the arch support lacking with the plastic inserts.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Worth It
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd pair of Danner boots. I was just as impressed with this pair as my first. Straight out of the box, they were an excellent and perfect fit. I'm sure that these are going to last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: M. Cser

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe. just a little narrow
customer_reviews.text: Good shoe. just a little narrow .... have shoe trees in for now to widen a bit .
customer_reviews.author: J Kimura

customer_reviews.title: Great boots! Super comfy
customer_reviews.text: Great boots! Super comfy. The size is pretty true, I ordered a half size up not knowing that, and they were too large. I wound up ordering the correct size. Problem solved.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's a great looking boot but the fit was way off.
customer_reviews.author: Robert D.

customer_reviews.title: I love these boots
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots! I have a hard time finding good boots that fit my narrow feet, and these are just right. They are comfortable, and I expect them to last a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Karl Gruenewald

customer_reviews.title: Takes very inaccurate readings
customer_reviews.text: The moisture gauge said a pit that sat all year round was wet. The PH gauge reads 8, not matter the soil.
customer_reviews.author: Greg G

customer_reviews.title: Doubt accuracy
customer_reviews.text: I don't think it's accurate. Soaking wet soil only reads moderately dry and the ph reading remains at 8.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Ikonne

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Boot but shoe box too small
customer_reviews.text: For me this boot fit fine at the ankle but the shoe box really squeezed by toes together to the point of being very uncomfortable. Sent back with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: John P

customer_reviews.title: US-made, fits exactly like the Danners I wore 20 years ago.
customer_reviews.text: The quality I expect from US-made Danner boots. The firm soles may take a little getting used to but they don't collapse under the stresses of long days of walking and stepping up and down, in and out of a truck 150+ times a day. They took about 2-3 days to break in, but now they feel good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worlds Best Boots!
customer_reviews.text: Danner makes the best boots in the world right in Oregon. This pair lives up to the legend. No break in needed, wear all day comfort, Love um!
customer_reviews.author: Tosh

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome fitting boots
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome fitting boots. Finally a pair my son loves after having numerous foot surgeries and needing something comfortable to walk or hike in.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie B.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: These were good boots, cant find em anymore for less than 300 bucks.
customer_reviews.author: DARIN J PETERSON

customer_reviews.title: Love My Danner's
customer_reviews.text: These Danner light hikers are the third pair I have owned. The first pair were given to me used. They come in a EE width which is nice. They take a little breaking in. the sponge in the sole is an awesome shock absorber and make long hikes and walks a pleasure. They are water proof for a long time, but need care to last. They breath well and provide great support. I use my old ones for crossing creeks and fishing. Expensive, but worth it I think! Love my Danner's!
customer_reviews.author: Stuart Walker

customer_reviews.title: They are as good or even better than I remember
customer_reviews.text: Owned a pair of Danner 20 plus years ago. They are as good or even better than I remember. Fit like a glove. Comfortable. Already completed my first weekend in them. Plus made in the USA,how can you beat that?
customer_reviews.author: John Shahadi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Quick delivering and nice fit. Price was high. I purchased a second pair a month later for a more reasonable price. They were dirty and had pebbles stuck in the soles.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Womack

customer_reviews.title: ... is my second pair of Danner boots and I love them. Hope these last 5+ years like my ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of Danner boots and I love them. Hope these last 5+ years like my first pair!
customer_reviews.author: Bob H.

customer_reviews.title: Danner Men's Danner Light II Outdoor Boot,Brown,10.5 EE US
customer_reviews.text: Bought several sets of the Danner, US made boots and all of them were comfortable right out of the box and comfortable to wear all day.
customer_reviews.author: ard322

customer_reviews.title: So far they look good they feel real good don't no how there are ...
customer_reviews.text: So far they look good they feel real good don't no how there are going g to hold up bur I'll rate it 5 star on look and feel.....
customer_reviews.author: Antonio

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Fit great, shipped fast... overall good experience. shoe is good quality and as described in the information. Very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: C.S.

customer_reviews.title: Danner Boots
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable right out of the box, no break in period needed. I own several Danner boots, the US made ones and they are great.
customer_reviews.author: ard322

customer_reviews.title: Great work boots
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these boots! He labors for a living and loves them. I buy multiple pairs at a time.
customer_reviews.author: amy r. greene

customer_reviews.title: OMG these boots are unbelievable plush!
customer_reviews.text: These boots have got them all beat. You just have to try them to understand how nice they are
customer_reviews.author: noneya biznass

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: These boots are great! The fit are just like my Sierra 8" and 8" Pronghorns - perfect! I love these boots!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Chan

customer_reviews.title: Great Boots
customer_reviews.text: This is my fifth pair of these boots over the last twenty years. My favorite boots ever, and they are made in the U.S.A.
customer_reviews.author: RDS

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best hiking and backpacking boots I have ever owned. Would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Johnson

customer_reviews.title: It's a Danner... Nuff said
customer_reviews.text: They're Danners. What else can i say. Excellent boot. Best price I could find anywhere. Buy any Danner and u wont regret it.
customer_reviews.author: androo3509

customer_reviews.title: Excellent in every respect including price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent in every respect including price. I have paid more for far inferior imported products. My boys have imported boots - they will be getting Danner boots for their birthday.
customer_reviews.author: Big H

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Small issue with the gusseted tongue biting into my ankle but a bit of foam padding helps immensely.
customer_reviews.author: Bret Noble

customer_reviews.title: I've never purchased any decent boots until this pair. ...
customer_reviews.text: I've never purchased any decent boots until this pair. They came with orthiotic insoles but I opted for the Superfeet greens. The superfeet greens have a bigger profile, and along with Darn Tough socks, the boots still feel comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Zephyr Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BOOT!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a half size to large. After ordering a smaller pair, I love this boot. Great for hiking and working. Have owned Danner's for well over 15 years and love the product.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly J Ladd

customer_reviews.title: Buy them
customer_reviews.text: Worth the price. My feet dont hurt after wearing them 12+ hrs.
customer_reviews.author: TITATINO

customer_reviews.title: Should order a half size up for footbed,now kinda small ...
customer_reviews.text: Should order a half size up for footbed,now kinda small and cannot wear thick socks. However the quality is really good,comfortable and need no time to break in.
customer_reviews.author: William Fung

customer_reviews.title: my first pair of Danners were awesome I wore them deep in the woods working wildfires ...
customer_reviews.text: my first pair of Danners were awesome I wore them deep in the woods working wildfires and they took the abuse real well. My 2nd pair (these ones) I where daily and they fit perfect. I'll probably have these the rest of my life.
customer_reviews.author: Rory Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Its a shame that when Ronald Reagan introduced Americans to "fair trade" with China that this boot would eventually disappear fr
customer_reviews.text: I have worn out a dozen pair of these boots over the years when I was a PH/Outfitter. Its a shame that when Ronald Reagan introduced Americans to "fair trade" with China that this boot would eventually disappear from sporting good store shelves & inventory. A better boot can not be found anywhere that I'm aware of!
customer_reviews.author: Albert Cooper

customer_reviews.title: More comfortable than I even could have ever imagined
customer_reviews.text: More comfortable than I even could have ever imagined, out of the box and only better after just a few days. However! I normally wear 13d. They were huge. 12e fits nice. And the sole in the left boot is about 3/8" wider than the right. Looks bad but not returning again. Guess I should have paid $500 for a pair of boots.
customer_reviews.author: jason robertson

customer_reviews.title: hiked over 200 miles with them and they are still comfortable. I feel good about supporting a USA product ...
customer_reviews.text: I've owned these boots for 2 years now, hiked over 200 miles with them and they are still comfortable. I feel good about supporting a USA product too. I brag about Danner boots to anyone who will listen.
customer_reviews.author: Dadwithtools

customer_reviews.title: Great boot - I wish they built it as a ...
customer_reviews.text: Great boot - I wish they built it as a true D width though. Had to return mine. Length is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: bradhowell

customer_reviews.title: High quality boots!!
customer_reviews.text: The boots are sturdy and heavy duty. I bought these for my husband and he loves them! They will last forever.
customer_reviews.author: Kari Sorboro

customer_reviews.title: Happy feet are smiling
customer_reviews.text: If you are used to wearing boots, slip these puppies on and get on with it. Great fit, comfortable and do the job well. Love the Gore tex liner, my feet have stayed cosy and dry, no aches, pains or discomfort, so far all the boxes are ticked, they also look good, my legs let them down in shorts...........yep! highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Agnew

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a regular shoe and had to return these for the wide.
customer_reviews.author: johnprime

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Dinners are pricey but are the best. Made in usa
customer_reviews.author: Big Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great boots, great fit
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for the hubby. Great boots, great fit, and he's getting a lot of wear out of them.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves these boots
customer_reviews.text: He wears boots every day, all day, and just loves these. The fit and the comfort. We'll be back for more.
customer_reviews.author: Jeri Bisel

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with these boots
customer_reviews.text: Sehr gut. American made boots. These are very comfortable. I normally wear an even wider boot but these have a good fit.
customer_reviews.author: JDA

customer_reviews.title: Fits Well and Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing Danner boots for fifteen years and this style specifically for 7 years. As expected these boots fit really well, but I have only had them a couple of months and the sole is starting to peel off.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D White

customer_reviews.title: Best hiking boot I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: The perfect boot. They fit like they were made for my feet. So comfortable and adds great ankle and foot support. Highly recommend getting these boots for hiking or for just hanging out. Give them time to break in, once they do you'll never want to take them off.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Gabrielli

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I went 1/2 size large, as I have a high instep and wrestling boots on is always an issue. Fit well, plenty of lacing to draw them up. Comfortable from first time out, and no problem since. Small complaint: the cloth insole sock bunches up under toes- leads to some blistering.
customer_reviews.author: William Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love the boots. I wear the Danner quarry's every day at work, and the Lights have a much thinner profile than those. My right boot is a little too tight, but I'm confident the leather will loosen up with wear. Very comfortable to hike in.
customer_reviews.author: rcguy-253

product_meta.title: Danner Mens 33000 Closed Toe Ankle Military Boots
product_meta.description: USA-made, classically designed, and packed with features, this boot keeps you outdoors in lightweight comfort.
feature_bullets: Danner Airthotic heel cradle and arch support
Handcrafted, stitchdown construction for strength and stability. Fiberglass shank
Vibram 148 Kletterlift outsole offers superior traction, stability and shock absorption on rugged terrain
